parameters: Hi Louis! Welcome to the Sandbox Mode. I hope you
can create amazing clips on this.
Now set what map the portal to go to. (Remember, if you
want to come back here, just press 7)
Do you want to change the visuals of your character?
상자개봉 - 바로 열리면서 스텟, 장비, 마법 중 하나 드랍
한등급 높은 상자개봉(15%) - 반만 천천히 열리고 화면
기본 레어도는 일반 65%, 고급20%, 레어10% 전설 5%
Hi Louis! Welcome to the Sandbox Mode. I hope you
can create amazing clips on this.
I'll help you with your Skill needs. So what do I owe
Do you want to learn new skills? Remember you can only
retain up to max of 4 Skills! Have fun!
Hi Louis! Welcome to the Sandbox Mode. I hope you
can create amazing clips on this.
Now you can spawn enemies by pressing "B".
You choose the amount, and the type. Then press B
will spawn the enemies in the map.
Let's start with the type of Enemy you want
Next the amount of enemies to spawn
Now you are all set! Press B to spawn! Enjoy!
